original_text: Take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves; for ye saw no manner of similitude on the day that the Lord spake unto you in Horeb out of the midst of the fire:
korean_text: 여호와께서 호렙 산 불길 중에서 너희에게 말씀하시던 날에 너희가 어떤 형상도 보지 못하였은즉 너희는 깊이 삼가라

sentences.original_text: Take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves
for ye saw no manner of similitude
on the day that the Lord spake unto you
out of the midst of the fire:
